text: ættenma visvasaya taba sitinnan ovunya. (ovun idiriye) allahge suddha vu namaya matak karanu læbuvahot ovunge hrdayan sæhimata pat vanneya. (mandayat) allahge suddha vu namaya matak kirima magin (satya visvasavantayinge) hrdayan niyata vasayenma trptiyata pat vanu æta yanna (nabiye! oba) dæna ganu (mænava)
